paper_abstract: We construct a class of entangled states in H = H-A circle times H-B circle times H-C quantum systems with dimH(A) = dimH(B) = dimH(C) = 2 and classify those states with respect to their distillability properties. The states are bound entanglement for the bipartite split (AB) - C. The states are non-positive partial transpose (NPT) entanglement and 1-copy undistillable for the bipartite splits A - (BC) and B - (AC). Moreover, we generalize the results of 2 circle times 2 circle times 2 systems to the case of 2n circle times 2n circle times 2n systems.
paper_title: Bound entanglement and distillability of multipartite quantum systems
